#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int t,m,a,n;
int x1dl,y1dl,x2dl,y2dl,x1gd,y1gd,x2gd,y2gd;
int xpdl,ypdl,xpgd,ypgd;

int main() {
//    freopen("hex.in", "r", stdin);
//    freopen("dule.out", "w", stdout);
  scanf("%d", &t);
  for (int T=1; T<=t; T++) {
    scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x1dl,&y1dl,&x1gd,&y1gd);
    scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x2dl,&y2dl,&x2gd,&y2gd);
    xpdl=max(x1dl, x2dl);
    ypdl=max(y1dl, y2dl);
    xpgd=min(x1gd, x2gd);
    ypgd=min(y1gd, y2gd);
    int pp;
    if (xpdl>=xpgd or ypdl>=ypgd) pp=0;
    else pp=(xpgd-xpdl)*(ypgd-ypdl);
    int sol=(x1gd-x1dl)*(y1gd-y1dl)+(x2gd-x2dl)*(y2gd-y2dl)-pp;
    printf("%d\n", sol);
  }
  return 0;
}
